mapper.select: SELECT c.co_no ,TO_CHAR(c.co_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS co_start_date ,TO_CHAR(c.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_date ,f.p_sex ,substr(f.p_rnum,1,6) as p_rnum ,c.end_reason ,c.co_ing_status ,c.co_release ,c.co_disease ,f.p_name ,a.d_name ,a.d_id ,d.ma_name ,c.co_doc ,a.d_pic FROM doctor a ,co_med c ,major d ,patient f ,co_doctor g WHERE a.d_id = g.d_id AND a.ma_no = d.ma_no AND c.p_no = f.p_no and c.co_no = g.co_no and c.co_no in (select h.co_no from co_med h, co_doctor i where h.co_no = i.co_no and i.d_id = #{dId} and i.paty_yn = 'Y' and h.co_ing_status= '2') and g.d_id = #{dId} ORDER BY c.co_start_date DESC
SELECT a.d_name ,b.ma_name FROM doctor a ,major b ,co_doctor c ,co_med d WHERE d.co_no = c.co_no AND a.ma_no = b.ma_no AND a.d_id = c.d_id AND c.paty_yn = 'Y' AND d.co_no =#{co_no}

select to_char(C.co_open_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as co_start_date, to_char(C.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as end_date, C.co_ing_status, C.co_release, C.co_disease, C.co_no, a.d_id, E.p_name, A.d_pic, A.d_name, D.ma_name from doctor A, co_med C, major D, patient E where A.d_id=C.CO_DOC and A.ma_no=D.ma_no and c.p_no = e.p_no and c.co_start_date is not null and c.co_disease is not null and C.co_ing_status='1' order by C.co_start_date DESC
select A.d_name, B.ma_name from doctor A, major B, co_doctor C, co_med D where D.co_no = C.co_no and A.ma_no=B.ma_no and A.d_id = C.d_id and C.paty_yn='Y' and D.co_no=#{co_no}

SELECT TO_CHAR(c.co_open_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS co_open_date ,TO_CHAR(c.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_date ,c.co_ing_status ,c.co_release ,c.co_disease ,c.co_no ,f.p_name ,a.d_name ,a.d_id ,d.ma_name ,c.co_doc ,a.d_pic FROM doctor a ,co_med c ,major d ,patient f WHERE a.d_id = c.co_doc AND a.ma_no = d.ma_no AND c.co_ing_status = '2' AND c.p_no = f.p_no AND c.end_date is not null ORDER BY c.co_open_date DESC
select A.d_name, B.ma_name,a.d_id from doctor A, major B, co_doctor C, co_med D where D.co_no = C.co_no and A.ma_no=B.ma_no and A.d_id = C.d_id and C.paty_yn='Y' and D.co_no=#{co_no}

select * from (select to_char(C.co_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as co_open_date, to_char(C.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as end_date, C.co_release, C.co_disease, c.co_ing_status, A.d_name, D.ma_name, c.co_no, a.d_id, d.ma_no, a.d_pic, f.p_name from doctor A, co_med C, major D, patient F where A.d_id=C.CO_DOC and A.ma_no=D.ma_no and f.p_no = c.p_no) where co_no in (select distinct(co_no) as co_no from co_med where co_doc in (select a.d_id from doctor a, major b where a.ma_no = b.ma_no and b.ma_name = #{ma_no})) order by co_start_date DESC

select A.d_name, B.ma_name from doctor A, major B, co_doctor C, co_med D where D.co_no = C.co_no and A.ma_no=B.ma_no and A.d_id = C.d_id and C.paty_yn='Y' and D.co_no=#{co_no}
